org.miniauth.oauth.signature

Class OAuthSignatureGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.miniauth.oauth.signature.OAuthSignatureBase
      • org.miniauth.oauth.signature.OAuthSignatureGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, SignatureGenerator

    public class OAuthSignatureGenerator
extends OAuthSignatureBase
implements SignatureGenerator
    Signature generator implementation for OAuth. Cf. http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5849#section-3.4
    See Also:
